tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE return_locations (
    location_id INT,
    return_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(255),
    state VARCHAR(255),
    postal_code VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE return_receivers (
    receiver_id INT,
    return_id INT,
    receiver_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);
